code: @Override public String getOperationName(Exchange exchange, Endpoint endpoint) {     Map<String, String> queryParameters = toQueryParameters(endpoint.getEndpointUri()).     return queryParameters.containsKey("operation") ? queryParameters.get("operation") : super.getOperationName(exchange, endpoint). }

@Override public void pre(Span span, Exchange exchange, Endpoint endpoint) {     super.pre(span, exchange, endpoint).     span.setTag(Tags.DB_TYPE.getKey(), ELASTICSEARCH_DB_TYPE).     Map<String, String> queryParameters = toQueryParameters(endpoint.getEndpointUri()).     if (queryParameters.containsKey("indexName")) {         span.setTag(Tags.DB_INSTANCE.getKey(), queryParameters.get("indexName")).     }     String cluster = stripSchemeAndOptions(endpoint).     if (cluster != null) {         span.setTag(ELASTICSEARCH_CLUSTER_TAG, cluster).     } }
